Package com.java.model.gamedata

Class GameData

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.java.model.gamedata.GameData
  • public class GameData
extends java.lang.Object
    This class hold the whole data that is going to be used during the game. For instance, the map, the players and the number of players are saved. This allows to keep the data in only place.
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Arnav Bhardwaj, Karan Dhingra, Ghalia Elkerdi, Sahil Singh Sodhi, Cristian Rodriguez
